text: Sphingomonas lacus is a Gram-negative, aerobic and motile bacteria from the genus of Sphingomonas which has been isolated from soil near a pond in Daejeon in Korea. Sphingomonas lacus produces astaxanthin-dideoxyglycoside. == Further reading == * == References == lacus Category:Bacteria described in 2015
title: Sphingomonas lacus
